scripts.build-local-reporter: npm run build && npm link && npm link testcafe-reporter-reportportal-plugin
scripts.run-e2e-tests: npm run build-local-reporter && npm run e2e-tests
scripts.run-e2e-retry-tests: npm run build-local-reporter && npm run e2e-retry-tests
scripts.run-e2e-no-live-reporting-tests: npm run build-local-reporter && npm run e2e-no-live-reporting-tests
scripts.run-e2e-display-debug-logs-tests: npm run build-local-reporter && npm run e2e-display-debug-logs-tests
scripts.run-full-e2e-tests: npm run build-local-reporter && npm run e2e-tests && npm run e2e-retry-tests && npm run e2e-no-live-reporting-tests && npm run e2e-display-debug-logs-tests
